Container.Name: ThreatIntelDashboard
Container.Overview: Threat Intelligence Dashboard - A comprehensive cybersecurity threat monitoring platform that aggregates data from MITRE ATT&CK, CISA, AlienVault OTX, and security RSS feeds. Features real-time threat tracking, APT group profiles, and security tool analysis.
Container.DonateText: If you find this useful, consider starring the GitHub repo!
Container.Description:
Threat Intelligence Dashboard aggregates and displays cybersecurity threat data from multiple sources:
Features: - MITRE ATT&CK Framework integration - CISA security alerts - AlienVault OTX threat pulses - RSS feed aggregation from security blogs - APT group tracking - Security tools database - Real-time threat monitoring
Setup: 1. Add your AlienVault OTX API key in the environment variables 2. Map the data directory to persist threat intelligence 3. Map the logs directory for debugging (optional) 4. Access the dashboard on port 5000
Default credentials: No authentication required (add reverse proxy with auth for production)

Variable.Name: OTX_API_KEY
Variable.Description: AlienVault OTX API Key - Get yours free at https://otx.alienvault.com/api

Variable.Name: SECRET_KEY
Variable.Description: Flask Secret Key - Used for session encryption (auto-generated if not set)

Variable.Description: MITRE ATT&CK data refresh interval in hours
